subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous king is associated with the construction of Amber Fort?
question_hi: अम्बर के बनाने के लिए पहले कौन सा महत्वपूर्ण राजा था?
explanation_en: Amber Fort was built by Rai Singh, a famous king of Jaipur. He was the builder of this iconic monument.

explanation_en: The famous Rana Lal Singh, also known as Rana Lal Singh, was a prince of Jaipur who is famously known for his role in the construction of Hawa Mahal and City Palace in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: जैं एक अन्यार का मैं एक अन्यार का मैं एक अन्यार, का मैं एक अन्यार का मैं एक अन्यार
answer_hi: जैं एक अन्यार का मैं एक अन्यार
